query: UPDATE model_runs SET dashboardJson = JSON_SET(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.front.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.front.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.front.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.long.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.long.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.long.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.hard.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.hard.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.hard.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2irFxzKmmF81jwU.root --database B2WSzxNLAGDJfUWCDHQ9cT --execute UPDATE model_runs SET dashboardJson = JSON_SET(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.fx.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.front.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.front.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.front.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.long.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.long.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.long.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END, '$.positions.hard.direction', CASE WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.hard.weight') > 0.05 THEN 'LONG' WHEN JSON_EXTRACT(dashboardJson, '$.positions.hard.weight') < -0.05 THEN 'SHORT' ELSE 'NEUTRAL' END);
